seed_pair.target: Nuestros amigos vinieron como a las seis.
seed_pair.known: Our friends came round at about six o'clock.

S0444: Sí pensaban que podría hacerse más eficientemente.
Yes they thought it could be done more efficiently.
S0445: Ellos van a poder llevar esa maleta.
They will be able to carry that suitcase.
S0446: Ellos no van a poder romper esa ventana.
They won't be able to break that window.
S0447: ¿Van a poder llevarnos a casa después de la comida?
Will they be able to drive us home after the meal?
S0448: Sí van a estar contentos de ayudar.
Yes they'll be happy to help.
S0449: Ellos dijeron que estaban casi preparados.
They said that they were almost ready.
S0450: No ellos tienen que tomar el tren ellos mismos.
No they have to catch the train themselves.
S0451: Ellos dijeron lo que querían hacer.
They said what they wanted to do.
S0452: Ellos no dijeron lo que querían hacer.
They didn't say what they wanted to do.
S0453: Did they say who they saw last night?
